member.name: T:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources.ConfigurationDirectoryChanged_Caption
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Configuration Directory Changed.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources.ConfigurationDirectoryChanged_Message
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The active shader configuration directory has changed. Saving this configuration will create and store a file in the new directory. Are you sure you want to continue?.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources.ConfigurationFileUpgrade_Caption
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Obsolete Configuration File.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources.ConfigurationFileUpgrade_Message
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The current shader configuration file was created with an older version of the shaders module. Would you like to upgrade? Note: you need to upgrade in order to change any settings but this operation is non-reversible..

member.name: P:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources.ConfigurationReadError_Caption
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Read Error.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Shaders.Configuration.Design.Resources.ConfigurationReadError_Message
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error loading the current shader configuration file. Please make sure that the file is accessible and that it has a correct format. Detailed error message:
{0}.
